name: 劉玉蓀
objective: In this course, students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor and company. In the case, analysis, design and implementation of solving problems will be improved to obtain good capacity.

scorePolicy: The grades will be determined based on the project results and students' efforts.

consultation: Students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor and company.
